English text: The duty value for this return in [£duty value]
Welsh text: Gwerth y doll ar gyfer y Datganiad hwn yw [£duty value]
Comments: We've translated "is" to match the screenshot, instead of "in"

English text: You will be liable for this amount once you send your return.
Welsh text: Byddwch yn agored i dalu’r swm hwn unwaith y byddwch yn anfon eich Datganiad.

English text: We calculated the total duty due on the alcoholic products you declared
Welsh text: Gwnaethom gyfrifo cyfanswm y doll sy’n ddyledus ar y cynhyrchion alcoholaidd a ddatganwyd gennych

English text: Check the values of declared alcohol and adjustments are correct before continuing.
Welsh text: Gwiriwch fod gwerthoedd yr alcohol a ddatganwyd a’r addasiadau yn gywir cyn parhau.
Newid[ cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill wedi’u datgan]
Rydych chi hefyd wedi ateb y canlynol

English text: The below answers will not affect how much you owe.
Welsh text: Ni fydd yr atebion isod yn effeithio ar faint sydd arnoch.
Newid[ alcohol y gohiriwyd tollau arno]
Does gennych chi ddim byd i’w dalu

English text: You need to pay [£ duty owed]
Welsh text: Mae angen i chi dalu [£ duty owed]
Dyma faint sy’n ddyledus i chi: [£ duty due]

English text: You sent your return for Alcohol Duty on [submission date] for the period [return period].
Welsh text: Gwnaethoch chi anfon eich Datganiad Toll Alcohol ar [submission date] ar gyfer y cyfnod [return period].

English text: You can pay your duty now or later from your Business Tax Account, but you must pay it by [payment due date]. You will be charged interest if you do not pay by this date.
Welsh text: Gallwch dalu’ch toll nawr neu’n hwyrach drwy’ch Cyfrif Treth Busnes, ond bydd yn rhaid i chi ei thalu erbyn [payment due date]. Codir llog arnoch os na fyddwch yn talu erbyn y dyddiad hwn.

English text: Payment for this return was due on [payment due date] and is late. You will be charged interest for the period from [payment due date] to the date you make payment.
Welsh text: Roedd disgwyl i chi wneud taliad ar gyfer y Datganiad hwn ar [payment due date] ond mae’r taliad yn hwyr. Codir llog arnoch ar gyfer y cyfnod sy’n dechrau ar [payment due date] ac sy’n dod i ben ar y dyddiad y gwnewch y taliad.

English text: Your reference number can be used as a payment reference when you pay this return.
Welsh text: Gellir defnyddio’ch cyfeirnod fel cyfeirnod talu wrth i chi wneud taliad ar sail y Datganiad hwn.

English text: Our bank details have changed. Choose Pay now and then Bank transfer (BACS/CHAPS) to see the new details.
Welsh text: Mae ein manylion banc wedi newid. Dewiswch ‘Talu nawr’ ac yna ‘Trosglwyddiad banc (BACS/CHAPS)’ er mwyn gweld y manylion newydd.

English text: You can also pay duty automatically by direct debit. Set up or manage your Direct Debit
Welsh text: Gallwch hefyd dalu toll yn awtomatig drwy Ddebyd Uniongyrchol. Sefydlwch neu rheolwch eich Debyd Uniongyrchol

English text: You have a direct debit set up. The duty due will automatically be taken on [payment due date]. Manage your direct debit
Welsh text: Rydych wedi sefydlu Debyd Uniongyrchol. Bydd y doll sy’n ddyledus yn cael ei chymryd yn awtomatig ar [payment due date]. Rheolwch eich Debyd Uniongyrchol

English text: You can also pay the duty automatically with a direct debit. Payments are taken on 25th of each month. Set up a direct debit
Welsh text: Gallwch hefyd dalu’r doll yn awtomatig drwy Ddebyd Uniongyrchol. Mae taliadau’n cael eu cymryd ar y 25ain o bob mis. Sefydlwch Ddebyd Uniongyrchol

English text: Return to your Business Tax Account
Welsh text: Yn ôl i’ch Cyfrif Treth Busnes

English text: You can claim duty owed now or later in your Alcohol Duty account. If you do not claim it back then it will be used toward any duty due from your next return.
Welsh text: Gallwch hawlio toll sy’n ddyledus nawr neu’n hwyrach drwy’ch cyfrif Toll Alcohol. Os na fyddwch yn ei hawlio’n ôl, bydd yn cael ei defnyddio tuag at unrhyw doll sy’n ddyledus yn sgil eich Datganiad nesaf.
